abilities.name: Sickening Vitality
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, add 1" to the Move characteristic of models in that unit and you can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.

abilities.name: Tocsin of Misery
abilities.rule: In the Battle-shock step of your opponentâ€™s Command phase, if an enemy unit that is below its Starting Strength is within 9" of this model, that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test if it is a **PSYKER** unit.
